message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CV

This paper is about multi-task learning in text classification, which involves natural language processing and machine learning. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also proposes a new method for converting labels into semantic vectors, which is related to representation learning and embedding techniques, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely category. Additionally, the paper involves information retrieval (cs.IR) as it deals with text classification, and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as it proposes a new method for multi-task learning. Finally, the paper also mentions experiments on benchmark datasets for text classification, which is related to computer vision (cs.CV) as it involves image classification benchmarks.
